articles.title: Police: Eddie Hassell, actor from 'The Kids Are All Right' and 'Surface,' killed in shooting - The Denver Channel
articles.description: Police in Texas say actor Eddie Hassell was killed in a shooting over the weekend. He was known for this roles in the TV show “Surface” and the film “The Kids Are All Right.”
articles.content:
GRAND PRAIRIE, Texas (AP) Police in Texas say the actor Eddie Hassell has died in a shooting.
The 30-year-old was known for his roles in the NBC show Surface and the 2010 film The Kids Are All Right… [+1087 chars]
